title: Silver Surfer: Parable
description: Galactus has converted humanity into his followers, and he's leading them to their doom! The planet-devouring demigod's only challenger is the hero he himself trapped on the Silver Surfer. It's a war for Earth's worship, but how much will be left when it's over? The Surfer must save his world and ours from the planet-sized peril posed by the Enslavers! With guest appearances by the Hulk, Spider-Man, Wolverine and more!  Silver Surfer (Epic) 1-2, Silver The Enslavers HC
author: Stan Lee
